string.value: If I ever lose the piece of cracked dimension, then I better go see Mr. Bouffon again.
I told #rMr. Bouffon#k that I lost the piece of cracked dimension. He told me he was going to give me another chance and that I should go see #rFlo#k immediately.
I was able to regain the lost piece of dimension from Flo. I should seriously take care of Papulatus this time.

Oh no, did you find the piece of cracked dimension by any chance? That's a rare, precious item, and without that, you won't be able to enter the center of the clocktower. Oh no... well, are you willing to take one more crack at it?
Alright. I may not be blessed with many abilities, so you may need to talk to #bFlo#k, who's at the left side of the Path of Time.
You don't want to take another crack on the challenge. I know it's not easy taking on Papulatus.
I heard about what happened through Mr. Bouffon. You lost your cracked piece of dimension? I'll give you my cracked piece right now.
How do I have cracked pieces of dimension? That's a secret, kind of like magic. Please drop by every once in a while.
#bFlo#k is at the entrance towards #bWarped Path of Time#k
